title: Klondike Gold Rush - Seattle Unit National Historical Park: Upcoming Events
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar     Upcoming Events              Upcoming Events & Exhibits         There's so much to explore! NPS/John Chao  National Park Service turns 100 in 2016! The Park Service is celebrating its centennial all year, and there are so many ways to participate in the our national stories.  Come Celebrate with Us in the Park! Living Voices performance of Within the Silence August 14 at 1:00 pm Birthday Party - Klondike Style Photo Booth, fun and commemorative Junior Ranger badges. 3:00-5:00pm Living Voices performance of Klondike: The Last Adventure August 28 at 1:00 pm Living Voices performance of La Causa September 4 at 1:00 pm Park(ing) Day September 16, 10:00 am-4:30pm Tales from the Parks Author Talk & Book Signing by Russell Cahill September 24, 2:00 - 3:00 pm           NPS photo   Join Us Out in the Community! Big Day of Play! August 13at Rainier Community Center (4600 38th Ave S) JamFest: Summer Neighborhood Music Fest August 18 Family Fun Day (Lullaby Theme) August 20 Mountain Fest & Camp Long's 75th Anniversary September 10 WTA@50 September 17
